name: gettingstarted
description: A quickstart for the Flatfile platform.

scripts.production:project-listener: npm run update-env production onboarding && npx flatfile@latest deploy workflows/project/index.ts
scripts.production:filefeed-listener: npm run update-env production filefeed && npx flatfile@latest deploy workflows/filefeed/index.ts
scripts.production:dynamic-listener: npm run update-env production dynamic && npx flatfile@latest deploy workflows/dynamic/index.ts
scripts.production:embedded-listener: npm run update-env production embedded && npx flatfile@latest deploy workflows/embedded/index.ts
scripts.dev:project-listener: npm run update-env dev onboarding && npx flatfile@latest develop workflows/project/index.ts
scripts.dev:filefeed-listener: npm run update-env dev filefeed && npx flatfile@latest develop workflows/filefeed/index.ts
scripts.dev:dynamic-listener: npm run update-env dev dynamic && npx flatfile@latest develop workflows/dynamic/index.ts
scripts.dev:embedded-listener: npm run update-env dev embedded && npx flatfile@latest develop workflows/embedded/index.ts
